meta.title: Creative Coding Bookclub
meta.description: The Creative Coding Bookclub is a new event to inspire eachother with practical coding challenges, by following a book yearly, and sharing our journey online and in-person

homepage.introWhoAreWe: The Creative Coding Bookclub is a new event, organised by [Mickey](https://mickeymarse.dev/) and [Luis](https://luis.earth/), in which we aim to actively work our way through writings that inspire the reader with practical coding challenges, while sharing our journey online and in-person.
homepage.introThis2025: [This 2025](https://creativecodingbook.club/book/2025) we started **'The Nature of Code' (2024)** by [Daniel Shiffman](https://thecodingtrain.com/about).
homepage.joinUsIntro: This event is for anyone who is curious about creative coding - whether you are a beginner or a seasoned developer.
homepage.joinUsForEveryone: If you're a beginner and you follow along, you will gain practice with fundamentals that will prove useful in your future coding endeavours, and if you're an experienced developer this is a chance to recap some theory and a great opportunity to help others.
homepage.joinUsMotivation: Even if you've never written a line of code, as long as you're motivated enough to put the time and effort you can make it!
homepage.inRealLifeVenue: Future events will take place at the [Borough Road Gallery](https://www.lsbu.ac.uk/student-life/facilities/facility-finder/borough-road-gallery), part of London South Bank University, which kindly agreed to host us on a regular basis.
homepage.inRealLifeLuma: We'll meet on the last Thursday of each month - find out more about upcoming events at [Luma](https://lu.ma/calendar/cal-l8dqsc8YHhI2Fbi)!
homepage.inRealLifeCraftSpace: The idea for this event originated at the Creative Coding Craft Space. Which also occurs monthly at Hackney Wick. Find more about them here.
homepage.onlineHashtag: If you post any bookclub-related content in social media feel free to mention us or tag the [#CreativeCodingBookclub](https://bsky.app/hashtag/CreativeCodingBookclub) hashtag for us to see your posts!
